A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie seemed like a repeat of 5 and a little of 6. Ben Solo is like a young anakin. You learned nothing about  the Sith Lord and ben's master. Leia being able to so fluently use the force despite not being trained in it. Every character was a comic relief character and it dragged in a lot of places throughout the movie. I would have given this movie 0 stars if I could have.
